message_1: A factory produces 200 chocolates in an hour. If the number of workers is doubled, how many chocolates will be produced in 2 hours?
message_2: If the number of workers is doubled, the production rate will also double. So, the factory will produce 200 * 2 = 400 chocolates in an hour. In 2 hours, the factory will produce 400 * 2 = 800 chocolates.
